mapper.sql:
WITH RECURSIVE board_sugg(rnum1,bbs_idx, bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_writer, bbs_regdate, bbs_hit, bbs_ref, bbs_depth, LEVEL, PATH, CYCLE) AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BBS_idx ASC) AS RNUM1, g.bbs_idx, g.bbs_title, g.bbs_content, g.bbs_writer, g.bbs_regdate, g.bbs_hit, g.bbs_ref, g.bbs_depth, 0, ARRAY[g.bbs_idx], false, g.bbs_use FROM board_suggestion g WHERE g.bbs_ref = 0
AND BBS_WRITER = #{bbs_writer}
UNION ALL
SELECT RNUM1, g.bbs_idx, g.bbs_title, g.bbs_content, g.bbs_writer, g.bbs_regdate, g.bbs_hit, g.bbs_ref, g.bbs_depth, LEVEL + 1, PATH || g.bbs_idx, g.bbs_idx = ANY(PATH), g.bbs_use FROM board_suggestion g, board_sugg sb WHERE g.bbs_ref = sb.bbs_idx AND NOT CYCLE ), LIST_SET AS ( SELECT RNUM1, bbs_idx, bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_writer, TO_CHAR(BBS_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBS_REGDATE, bbs_hit, bbs_ref, lpad(' ', LEVEL) || bbs_title AS bbs_title2, bbs_depth, LEVEL, PATH, bbs_use FROM board_sugg
WHERE
( LOWER(BBS_TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{item}) || '%' OR LOWER(BBS_CONTENT) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{item}) || '%' OR LOWER(BBS_WRITER) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{item}) || '%' )
LOWER(${category}) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{item}) || '%'
ORDER BY PATH desc )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select row_number() over(order by rnum1 asc, path desc) as RNUM, * from LIST_SET order by rnum desc LIMIT #{endRow} ) A OFFSET #{startRow}
SELECT BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_WRITER, TO_CHAR(BBS_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBS_REGDATE, BBS_HIT, BBS_REF, BBS_DEPTH, BBS_USE FROM BOARD_SUGGESTION WHERE BBS_IDX = #{bbs_idx}

UPDATE BOARD_SUGGESTION SET BBS_HIT = BBS_HIT + 1 WHERE BBS_IDX = #{bbs_idx}
